targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = true) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) as success_rate
FROM registration_attempts
WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM registration_attempts WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM registered_accounts WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM registration_attempts WHERE success = false AND attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'

SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('minute', attempted_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = true) as "Successful",
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = false) as "Failed"
FROM registration_attempts
WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time
SELECT network, COUNT(*) as count FROM registered_accounts GROUP BY network

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN error_message ILIKE '%timeout%' THEN 'Timeout'
    WHEN error_message ILIKE '%captcha%' THEN 'CAPTCHA'
    WHEN error_message ILIKE '%password%' THEN 'Password Issues'
    WHEN error_message ILIKE '%exists%' OR error_message ILIKE '%taken%' THEN 'Username Taken'
    WHEN error_message ILIKE '%form%' THEN 'Form Not Found'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END as reason,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM registration_attempts
WHERE success = false 
  AND attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
  AND error_message IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY reason
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT 
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE captcha_required = true) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1) as captcha_rate
FROM registration_attempts
WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'

SELECT 
  site_domain as Domain,
  username as Username,
  network as Network,
  CASE WHEN success THEN 'âœ“ Success' ELSE 'âœ— Failed' END as Result,
  CASE WHEN captcha_required THEN 'ðŸ¤– Yes' ELSE 'âœ“ No' END as CAPTCHA,
  COALESCE(error_message, 'N/A') as Error,
  attempted_at as "Attempted At",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - attempted_at)) || 's ago' as "Time Ago"
FROM registration_attempts
ORDER BY attempted_at DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT 
  site_domain as Domain,
  network as Network,
  COUNT(*) as "Account Count",
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'active') as Active,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'banned') as Banned,
  MAX(registered_at) as "Last Registered"
FROM registered_accounts
GROUP BY site_domain, network
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN email_verified THEN 'Verified'
    WHEN email IS NOT NULL THEN 'Pending Verification'
    ELSE 'No Email Required'
  END as status,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM registered_accounts
GROUP BY status

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - attempted_at)) < 300 THEN '0-5 min'
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - attempted_at)) < 600 THEN '5-10 min'
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - attempted_at)) < 1800 THEN '10-30 min'
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - attempted_at)) < 3600 THEN '30-60 min'
    ELSE '60+ min'
  END as time_bucket,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM registration_attempts
WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours'
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket

SELECT 
  site_domain as Domain,
  username as Username,
  status as Status,
  CASE 
    WHEN last_login_at IS NULL THEN 'Never'
    ELSE EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - last_login_at)) || 's ago'
  END as "Last Login",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - registered_at)) || 's ago' as Age
FROM registered_accounts
WHERE status = 'active'
ORDER BY registered_at DESC
LIMIT 30
SELECT COUNT(*) as rate FROM registration_attempts WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - attempted_at))) as avg_time FROM registration_attempts WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.domain) FROM pages p LEFT JOIN registered_accounts ra ON p.domain = ra.site_domain WHERE p.has_register_form = true AND ra.id IS NULL

SELECT 
  network as Network,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = true) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 0) || '%' as "Success Rate"
FROM registration_attempts
WHERE attempted_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
GROUP BY network
ORDER BY network
